languages.text: Встреченный разведчик утверждает, что в глубине улья есть еще выжившие. Он отметил примерное расположение тайного прохода и предупредил о поджидающей опасности.

traits.locale_text: Встреченный разведчик утверждает, что в глубине улья есть еще выжившие. Он отметил примерное расположение тайного прохода и предупредил о поджидающей опасности.

languages.text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.
languages.original_text: Встреченный разведчик утверждает, что в глубине улья есть еще выжившие. Он отметил примерное расположение тайного прохода и предупредил о поджидающей опасности.

traits.locale_text: The scout you encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told you the approximate location of the secret passage and warned you of the danger lying in wait.
The scout you encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told you the approximate location of the secret passage and warned you of the danger lying in wait.
The scout you encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told you the approximate location of the secret passage and warned you of the danger lying in wait.
The scout you encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told you the approximate location of the secret passage and warned you of the danger lying in wait.

languages.text: 行商浪人遇到的那位斥候声称巢都深处有其他幸存者。他告诉了行商浪人秘密通道的大致位置，并警告前方可能会遇到危险。
languages.original_text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人遇到的那位斥候声称巢都深处有其他幸存者。他告诉了行商浪人秘密通道的大致位置，并警告前方可能会遇到危险。
你遇到的那位斥候声称巢都深处有其他幸存者。他告诉了你秘密通道的大致位置，并警告你前方可能会遇到有危险。

languages.text: 遭遇した偵察は、ハイヴの奥深くにさらに生存者がいると主張している。彼は自由開拓者に秘密の通路のおおよその位置を教え、危険が待ち構えていることを警告した。
languages.original_text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.

traits.locale_text: 遭遇した偵察は、ハイヴの奥深くにさらに生存者がいると主張している。彼は自由開拓者に秘密の通路のおおよその位置を教え、危険が待ち構えていることを警告した。
あなたが遭遇した偵察兵は、ハイヴの奥深くにさらに生存者がいると主張している。彼は秘密の通路のおおよその位置を教え、危険が待ち構えていることを警告した。

languages.text: El explorador con el que se ha encontrado {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente asegura que hay más supervivientes en las profundidades de la colmena. Le ha indicado la ubicación aproximada del pasaje secreto y ha advertido del peligro que acecha.
languages.original_text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.

traits.locale_text: El explorador con el que se ha encontrado {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente asegura que hay más supervivientes en las profundidades de la colmena. Le ha indicado la ubicación aproximada del pasaje secreto y ha advertido del peligro que acecha.

languages.text: Der Scout, dem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} begegnet ist, behauptet, dass es in den Tiefen der Makropole weitere Überlebende gibt. Er hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die ungefähre Position des geheimen Ganges genannt und {mf|ihn|sie} vor den dort lauernden Gewahren gewarnt.
languages.original_text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.

traits.locale_text: Der Scout, dem {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} begegnet ist, behauptet, dass es in den Tiefen der Makropole weitere Überlebende gibt. Er hat {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die ungefähre Position des geheimen Ganges genannt und {mf|ihn|sie} vor den dort lauernden Gewahren gewarnt.

Der Scout, dem du begegnet bist, behauptet, dass es in den Tiefen der Makropole weitere Überlebende gibt. Er hat dir die ungefähre Position des geheimen Ganges genannt und dich vor den dort lauernden Gewahren gewarnt.

languages.text: L'éclaireur que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait rencontré affirme qu'il y a d'autres survivants plus loin dans la ruche. Il lui indique l'emplacement approximatif du passage secret et {mf|le|la} met en garde contre les dangers qui y rôdent.
languages.original_text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.

traits.locale_text: L'éclaireur que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avait rencontré affirme qu'il y a d'autres survivants plus loin dans la ruche. Il lui indique l'emplacement approximatif du passage secret et {mf|le|la} met en garde contre les dangers qui y rôdent.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in karşılaştığı keşif eri, kovanın derinliklerinde hayatta kalan daha fazla kişi olduğunu iddia ediyor. Hür Tacir'e gizli geçidin yaklaşık konumunu tarif edip orada bekleyen tehlike konusunda uyarılarda bulundu.
languages.original_text: The scout the Rogue Trader encountered claims that there are more survivors deep in the hive. He told the Rogue Trader the approximate location of the secret passage and warned {mf|him|her} of the danger lying in wait.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in karşılaştığı keşif eri, kovanın derinliklerinde hayatta kalan daha fazla kişi olduğunu iddia ediyor. Hür Tacir'e gizli geçidin yaklaşık konumunu tarif edip orada bekleyen tehlike konusunda uyarılarda bulundu.
